Room.Name: Surrounded by Flowers
Room.ShortDescription: You have found your way into an area that abounds with flowers,
Room.LongDescription: As you enter this room, you begin to feel a little drowsy, perhaps its just the effects of a long daysadventuring, but maybe its the polen of the many flowers that surround you, which you don't recognize but all the same, the room starts to spin and you feel like sitting down, or at least staying a while.
